resources.description: Based on the author’s experience in developing testing system, this paper systematically introduced the development process of testing system and the development tools of testing system. Meanwhile, this paper also introduced some common problems appeared when we develop testing system. Finally for these common problems we made specific analysis. Actual teaching result showed that using the testing system could stimulate the learning interest of the students and achieve good teaching effect.
resources.name: The Development and Realization of C Language Test System Based on Authoware

name: the-development-and-realization-of-c-language-test-system-based-on-authoware
notes: Based on the author’s experience in developing testing system, this paper systematically introduced the development process of testing system and the development tools of testing system. Meanwhile, this paper also introduced some common problems appeared when we develop testing system. Finally for these common problems we made specific analysis. Actual teaching result showed that using the testing system could stimulate the learning interest of the students and achieve good teaching effect.  http://www.sjie.org/paperInfo.aspx?ID=346
title: The Development and Realization of C Language Test System Based on Authoware
